summary:
Doha is Qatar's capital and main financial center. It's on the Persian Gulf coast and is the country's biggest and fastest-growing city. Over 80% of Qataris live in Doha or nearby. It became the capital in 1971 when Qatar gained independence.

Doha hosts important events like the World Trade Organization talks and big sports events like the Asian Games and the FIFA World Cup. It's also home to special areas for education, healthcare, and sports. Doha is known for being very safe.
title: Doha
